member.name: T:Autodesk.Windows.RibbonControl
member.summary: This class controls the visual aspects of a ribbon.

member.name: M:Autodesk.Windows.RibbonControl.ShowContextualTab(Autodesk.Windows.RibbonTab,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Shows or hides the specified contextual tab.
member.param: Tab to show as a contextual tab.

Value indicating whether the tab should be shown as a merged contextual tab. If mergedTab is true the tab is shown as a merged contextual tab, which merges the panels of this tab to the panels of all the tabs; if false the tab is added to the list of tabs and has to be activated like any other tab.

Value indicating whether the tab needs to be activated. If activate is true the contextual tab is displayed and also set as the active tab; if false the contextual tab is displayed but not set as the active tab. This argument is used only if mergedTab is false.

member.name: M:Autodesk.Windows.RibbonControl.HideContextualTab(Autodesk.Windows.RibbonTab)
member.summary: Hides the specified contextual tab.
member.param: Contextual tab to hide.

member.summary: Gets or sets the command handler to be called when the RibbonCombo menu items are executed The command is routed to the first command handler found while searching in the following order: the command handler set in the itemthe command handler set in the RibbonCombothe command handler set in the root control that contains this item (ribbon, Quick Access Toolbar, menu, or status bar)the global command handler set in ComponentManager.CommandHandler.The default value is null.
